items.title: Arbeloa stelt zijn talentvolle oogappeltje direct op bij Real Madrid
items.summary: √Ålvaro Arbeloa heeft bekendgemaakt met welke elf Real Madrid het in de Copa del Rey gaat opnemen tegen Albacete. De kersverse trainer van De Koninklijke heeft direct plaats voor Jorge Cestero.

items.title: Delay in disallowed Semenyo goal an 'edge case'
items.summary: The delay in ruling out a Manchester City goal for offside in Tuesday's Carabao Cup win at Newcastle was extended because semi-automated offside technology could not be used in the incident.

items.title: Man City sign USWNT's Coffey from Thorns
items.summary: Manchester City have announced the signing of United States midfielder Sam Coffey from NWSL side Portland Thorns.

items.title: Monaco CEO on injured Pogba: Plan isn't working
items.summary: Monaco's CEO acknowledged that their original plan for Paul Pogba "is not working," with the former France star limited to just 30 minutes of action since joining the club last summer.

items.title: Richards named U.S. Male Player of the Year
items.summary: Crystal Palace and United States defender Chris Richards has been voted the 2025 U.S. Soccer Male Player of the Year, the federation announced Wednesday.

items.title: VI Live: PSV heeft geen kind aan Den Bosch, vroege goals in Deventer en Almere
items.summary: Smullen op de woensdagavond. In de Eurojackpot KNVB Beker staan AZ en Ajax tegenover elkaar. Maar eerst komt PSV - op bezoek bij FC Den Bosch - in actie. In het buitenland staan onder meer Chelsea - Arsenal, FC Porto - Benfica en wedstrijden van Real Madrid, Bayern M√ºnchen, Napoli en Internazionale op het programma. Ook de halve finales van de Afrika Cup worden vanavond afgewerkt.

The teams are out and the national anthems are being sung. First Senegal and then Egypt. Lots of support for both sides at the Tangier Grand Stadium. Continue reading...

The only slight surprise is the inclusion of Marc Guiu up front. William Saliba and Leandro Trossard are fit to start in a very strong Arsenal team. Never mind the starting XI, even the bench is frightening. Continue reading...

items.title: Man√© zit Salah dwars: Senegal naar finale Afrika Cup
items.summary: Senegal is de eerste finalist van de Afrika Cup in Marokko. In de halve finale was het West-Afrikaanse land de baas over recordwinnaar Egypte. Sadio Man√© maakte het verschil voor zijn land.

items.title: Grim heeft Sutalo terug en ziet Baas juist afhaken
items.summary: De opstelling van Ajax voor het bekerduel met AZ is bekendgemaakt. Trainer Fred Grim, die tot het einde van het seizoen aanblijft , husselt gedwongen in zijn defensie.

items.title: Respectvolle uitfans van PSV juichen pas na eerbetoon FC Den Bosch
items.summary: De fans van PSV hebben zich woensdagavond in Den Bosch van hun beste kant laten zien. De meegereisde Eindhovenaren juichten pas een kleine minuut na de 0-2 van Dennis Man.

items.title: Conor Gallagher vows to bring Tottenham ‚Äòspecial moments‚Äô after ¬£34.6m transfer
items.summary: Midfielder signs long-term deal after move from Atl√©tico Thomas Frank: ‚ÄòConor will bring leadership and maturity‚Äô Conor Gallagher has pledged to bring ‚Äúspecial moments‚Äù to Tottenham after completing a ¬£34.6m transfer from Atl√©tico Madrid. The London club moved quickly for a midfielder they have long admired after losing Rodrigo Bentancur to a hamstring injury at Bournemouth last Wednesday, beating off competition from Aston Villa. Bentancur has since undergone surgery. Spurs looked at Gallagher at the end of the 2023-24 season only for him to go from Chelsea to Atl√©tico for ¬£34m. Before the Premier League game between Chelsea and Spurs in May 2024 at Stamford Bridge, the home support unfurled a giant banner of Gallagher. ‚ÄúChelsea since birth,‚Äù read the caption about their academy product. The subtext was clear: do not sell him to Spurs. Continue reading...

items.title: 'If Flick hadn't come, I would have left Barca' - Raphinha
items.summary: Raphinha has become one of Barcelona's most dependable performers and a decisive figure in their biggest matches, which he credits Hansi Flick for.

items.title: Littler vs Lim headlines first round of Bahrain Darts Masters
items.summary: Luke Littler, Gian Van Veen and Luke Humphries have been handed their first round matches in this year's Bahrain Darts Masters, in the first event of the 2026 World Series of Darts.

items.title: Is Wenger's daylight idea the solution to fix offside?
items.summary: Is the offside law about to change to Arsene Wenger's daylight idea? And should football make that change just because of VAR?

items.title: Tottenham sign Gallagher from Atletico for ¬£35m
items.summary: The former Chelsea midfielder joins Spurs on a deal until 2031.

items.title: Gallagher joins Spurs
items.summary: Tottenham have completed the signing of England midfielder Conor Gallagher from Atletico Madrid for a fee of ¬£34m.

items.title: ‚ÄòOne of the world‚Äôs best‚Äô: Manchester City swoop for USWNT midfielder Sam Coffey
items.summary: USA mainstay in move from Portland Thorns ‚ÄòI couldn‚Äôt be more ready and happy about everything‚Äô Manchester City have signed the USA midfielder Sam Coffey on a three-and-a-half year deal. The 27-year-old won gold at the Paris 2024 Olympics and has accrued 42 caps and scored five goals for the USA, becoming a key part of Emma Hayes‚Äô national team. After graduating she joined Portland Thorns and lifted the 2022 NWSL Championship in her debut season. Continue reading...

items.title: Premier League's top 50 transfers of all time: Who is No. 1?
items.summary: What makes a great signing? Is it trophies won, goals scored, a long run of dominance ... or all of the above? Bill Connelly breaks down the best 50 Premier League moves since it began in 1992-93.

items.title: Fleetwood determined to close the gap on McIlroy and Scheffler
items.summary: Dubai Invitational defending champion, Tommy Fleetwood, revealed what it is like to be next-best to two of the Tour's greatest players after a year of consistency paid off and he moved up the rankings to third.
